original_title: A Senior CIA officer for 30 years confirms the psychological operations they use overseas were turned against Donald Trump and the American People to keep Democrats in power  — The Donald
article_summary: A retired senior CIA officer has confirmed the agency used psychological operations against Donald Trump and the American public to maintain Democratic power, with the Smith-Mundt Act of 2013 enabling propaganda on news and airwaves. Users on the platform express concern about societal issues being traced back to this act and call for its immediate revocation.</s>
